name: @megawubs/eloquentjs
description: An active record like approach to consuming an API, inspired by Laravel's Eloquent

scripts.tests: webpack tests/**/*.js server/test-bundle.js && cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.js server/mocha.js && webpack tests/bootstrap.js server/bootstrap.js && cd server && php -S 127.0.0.1:8001 && open -a 'Google Chrome' 127.0.0.1:8001 && cd ../

author: MegaWubs
